  • Uses of WeaponItem in game.weapons

    Subclasses of WeaponItem in game.weapons
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Club
    A hammer type, represented by ! (the exclamation mark), that deals 103 damage with an 80% hit rate.
    class 
    GreatKnife
    A dagger type, represented by / (the forward slash), that deals 75 damage with a 70% hit rate.
    class 
    Grossmesser
    A curved sword, represented by ? (question mark), carried around by the Heavy Skeletal Swordsman that deals 115 damage with 85% attack accuracy.
    class 
    Scimitar
    A curved sword, represented by s (lowercase S), carried around by the Skeletal Bandit that deals 118 damage with 88% accuracy.
    class 
    Uchigatana
    A katana type, represented by ")" (the close parenthesis), that is a starting weapon of the Samurai class.
